address: 9 Linh Dam, Nguyen Duy Trinh, Hoang Liet, Hoang Mai, Ha Noi
fulltext:
LUU TUAN ANH
SENIOR INTERNAL/EXTERNAL AUDITOR
OBJECTIVE
As a dynamic person with analytical thinking and high sense of responsibility at work with
experience in accounting and auditing field, I am looking for a suitable position in
Finance/Investment/ Consulting to be able to contribute positively to the development
of the company.
WORK EXPERIENCE
SENIOR INTERNAL AUDITOR
// 2021 - Now
Tan Long group joint stock company
- Reviewing documents periodically, ensuring compliance with internal regulations and
state regulations of subsidiaries in the group.
- Report the situation and advise business risk to directors.
- Perform periodic and extraordinary reviews according to the Internal Control process
and also under the direction of leaders.
SENIOR EXTERNAL AUDITOR // 2019 - 2021
KPMG VietNam Limited
- Provide audit financial statements services to corporate clients, including budget
preparation, planning and implementation of audit procedures under VAS and IFRS
standards.
- Coaching, supervise and control team members.
- Identify errors and provide solutions to enhance accounting controls in the client's
accounting procedures..
AUDIT ASSISTANT
/ 2017 - 2019
KPMG VietNam Limited
- Perform audit testing over financial statement of the corporation to ensure compliance
with VAS and IFRS.
- Assist and lead junior staff and interns in obtaining all necessary audit working papers.
documentation including researching and documenting facts and findings.
PROFILE
V
tuananhge5@gmail.com
e
0353962535
9
Linh Dam, Nguyen Duy Trinh, Hoang
Liet, Hoang Mai, Ha Noi.
22/09/1995
SKILLS
WORKING SKILLS
- Information about creating office
computer tools (Word, Excel, Power Point,
Power BI...)
- Work under pressure with high
performance.
- Good decision making and judgment
skills.
- Possess leadership skills, multi-tasking.
time management and at the same time
good communication with customers and
colleagues.
CORE COMPETENCIES
- Deep understanding in VAS and IFRS
reporting.
- 6 years experienced in working with
clients in many industries, especially real
estate development.
- Flexibility. willing to adapt to new
challenges and changes
- Leadership and personnel management.
- Attention to detail.
EDUCATION
AUDITING
// 2013 - 2017
National Economic University
Bachelors Degree in Auditing
CPA
// 2013 - 2017
CPA Australia - ongoing
MOS (MICROSOFT OFFICE SPECIALIST)
// 2016
Microsoft
Courses: Microsoft Word, Excel and Power point
ACHIEVEMENT
2015
Scholarship for excellent students of
Smart train training center.
2020
Excellent staff in Hanoi office - KPMG
Company.
PARTICIPATION PROJECTS
ACT AS IN CHARGE IN FOLLOWING NOTICEABLE ENGAGEMENTS:
// 2017 - Now
Energy: Genco1 Uong Bi, Bitexco Nho Que hydropower.
Manufacturing: ABB Automation And Electrification VietNam, Song Gianh Cement.
Panasonic VietNam, Vinatex Northern Separate and Conso.o.
Real estate and Infrastructure development: Vincom Retail Suoi Hoa, Nishimatsu VietNam.
Other services: Vin University, Vinmec, Song Lam Nghe An Football Club..
REFERENCES
Ms. Nguyen Thi Viet Hoa - Senior Audit
Manager
KPMG Vietnam Co., Ltd
Email: hnguyen26@kpmg.com.vn
Phone: (+84) 904506713
